name: Smart Tanks 2
description:
A game based on the old classic tanks, in which a lot of us played in 90's.

This one has more modern graphic, four AI levels and several new features, which make it more mind oriented and complicated ..but you can always switch to easy AI and just have fun without noticeable resistance from your enemies.

Version 2.0's changes:

  • added achievements system;
  • 9 new maps;
  • more textures and animations;
  • improved AI for "Hard" and "Critical" levels;
  • "speeder" feature.

Note that all maps could be passed on critical level without achievements :)
